args:
With folks shaken by Luca's death, a creature
named Carmen appears and claims to be their
guide to ＂the game.＂ The party balks at the rules
to this game—since it involves killing each
other if they want to leave the island—and
the next day, another of them has fallen...
I don't care how much you enjoy a good\nprank, Luca—a joke of this magnitude\nis utterly tasteless!
I-indeed. If you keep this up, we'll have no\nchoice but to...l-leave you and go home,\nunderstand?
Luca! Quit bein' a jerk and get yer\nbutt up already!
Enough. Nature has spoken.\nThere is nothing to be done.
But just yesterday he was... I mean...\nBy Ilia, how could this have happened?
Because he was murdered, of course—\nby one of the very people here!
Ladies and jerks, welcome to the island of\nutter despair! Now grab a pair of clean\nundies and let the game of games BEGIN!

Why, I'm Carmen—local overseer and your
personal guide to the grand gambol that is
our island's game. Oh, and if you want to
call me Car-Car, that's fine. *wink*
I think she is some manner of fiend, but...
If you know aught of Luca's death,\ntell us with all speed or I will see\nyou cut down, demon!
Well, this one's feisty! Yeah, so like I said,\nhe's been murdered by one of you.
Shut yer damn mouth! Ain't no one here\nwhat would MURDER Luca!

You sure about that, big boy? Really sure?
Like, there isn't a single one of you here
who might off an annoying sylvan in order
to benefit themselves in some way?
If ya got a point, make it before I decide\nto smash yer damn teeth in!
Easy there, friend! Your old pal Luca has\njust been dropped from the game, is all.\nNo need for the threats, my goodness.

Oh, it's a game all right—a game of
SURVIVAL. And you lucky sons of guns
are gonna start murdering each other
right here and now, so get to it!
Are you mad? What could we possibly\ngain by killing each other?

Oh, you're not going to ＂gain＂ bupkis.
Buuut you've already been locked into
the game by Scylla, so ＂gain＂ doesn't
really have much to do with anything.
Oh, you are just so ADORABLE!\nNah, that fight you had earlier?\nThat was bait.
Bait to entice chumps like you to this\nisland so she can devour your souls.
Each of you rests in the palm of her hand!\nOr maybe it's better to say you rest in the\ndepths of her belly. Grosser, but better.
This island has been sealed by Scylla.\nNo one is leaving. NO ONE.
Well, until we get to the end of the game,\nthat is. Then whichever one of you is still\nalive gets to leave.
So go out there and make it fun, okay?\nShe wants to see some action!
Better put yer fiddle away, friend,\n'cause there ain't no way in hell\nany of us are dancin' to yer tune.
Well, in that case, I hope you have a good\nisland real estate agent, because you're\ngoing to be here for a loooong time.
I have a better idea: I'll pummel you\nwithout mercy until you tell us how to\nget off this damned island! Haaaah!
...Huh? My attack went right through it!
Yeah, you can't hurt me, sweetie.\nSorry not sorry.

Like I said, I'm just an overseer for the
game—like a dungeon master without
all the dice. I have no ACTUAL power,
but you also have no power over me.
So if you ever want to make it off this rock,\nyou better get with the murder toot sweet.
You're wasting your time—and ours.\nWe're not going to kill each other.

Aw, look at the brave face. So brave!
Well, I promise not to rub that in later
'cause I'm nice, but you're abso-LUTELY
gonna be killing each other soon.
Anyhoo, I look forward to seeing which\nsteaming corpse takes center stage next.\nTa-ta, my new friends! Ta-taaaaaa!
So, uh, what's the plan here, guys?
We need to give Luca a proper burial—\nalthough I hate the thought of leaving\nhim on this island.
Perhaps we should put the truth of this\nisland's power to keep us here to the test.
Good idea. We certainly can't just take\nthat Carmen's word for it.
Yeah, that thing's shadier than a parasol!\nRight then, I'm gonna take a boat out.
Just gimme a little bit, Luca, old buddy.\nRanzal's gonna bring ya home.
Lousy! It's like there's some kinda invisible\nwall on the ocean—I can't hit open sea.
Hmm. If Carmen told the truth about that,\neverything else might also be true.
Dude, please tell me you aren't thinking\nabout actually playing this murder game.\nI got tiny stick arms! I can't kill ANYBODY!
Easy, Notte—no one is going to start\nkilling each other. We just need a plan.
Yeah, friends offin' friends?\nThat's some poor comedy right there.
Which doesn't mean it won't happen.

Let's assume Carmen is correct and we
cannot leave the island unless we play
the game. Are we REALLY all prepared
to stay here until old age takes us?
What of Alberia, {player_name}?\nWhat of your own sister?\nCould you really abandon them?

All of us have things back home that we
would miss, which means all of us have
at least some reason to consider playing
along with Scylla's mad game.

I mean, yeah, if we're all stuck here we
might get cabin fever and start havin'
dark thoughts, so we just gotta come up
with a plan before that happens.
I am merely trying to point out what you\nwere all too frightened to say, Ranzal!
(If only one of us can leave...)
Well, there goes the sun. I can't believe\nwe're staying here another night.
At least there's plenty of food here.\nI mean, not that anyone's hungry...
I can't even think about eating at a\ntime like this. Poor Luca...
Also I don't wanna worry anybody,\nbut I ain't seen Mikoto, Patia, Cleo,\nOR Norwin since this afternoon.
Cleo and Norwin said they wanted to look\ndeeper into what happened with Luca.
Patia believes Scylla is somewhere\non the island and went off to find her.
And Mikoto disappeared without a word.\nHonestly, what a vexing man.
I suppose they all figure doing something\nis better than doing nothing.
Y-yeah, there ain't no need to be worried.
Look, let's eat and get some shut-eye.\nBein' tired'll just fill our heads up\nwith a buncha weird thoughts.
R-right. We'll need our strength to keep\ninvestigating the island tomorrow.
Up and at 'em, friends! Car-Car is here to\nwake you from your beauty sleep—and\nboy, do some of you ever need it!
Oh wow. You actually looked scary there.\nStill, what prince could be sweet and\ncarefree when his little friends are dead?
Ah, but you misunderstand, dear prince.\nYou still think I'm the one who killed\nyour friends when I am just a guide.
One of YOU is the killer!
Aw, shut your pie hole! Even Ranzal\ncouldn't swallow that much baloney!

Hey, believe what you want—it's no skin
off my tush. Still won't stop the whole
＂Oh no, all of my friends are dying＂ bit,
but if it makes you feel better, go for it.
You keep saying ＂friends.＂\nAs in, plural friends.

Took you long enough! Geez, I thought
I was gonna have to draw a map here.
Yeah, so take a caaareful look around and
see if you notice anyone missing, 'kay?
Yes. YES! Another chump, dead as a\ndoornail! Say, what is a doornail,\nanyway? Do you guys know?
Oh, silly me! You just wanna know who\nthe fresh meat is, yeah? Well, iiit's...
